brief.content-text: The diagram depicts the O S I model with the Physical Layer highlighted. A group of people are shown next to an IP phone, a desktop PC, and a laptop. An arrow points from these to the Physical Layer of the O S I model. Photographs are shown of coaxial cable attached to a Cable Modem Termination System (CMTS), Ethernet twisted pair cabling attached to a LAN patch panel, and a cellular/microwave wireless antenna tower. The Physical Layer interconnects our data networks.
